item.title: My First Post
item.description: This is my first post on Hugo. I am going to design my own theme! $$\sum_{k=1}^{\infty} \frac{1}{k^2} = \frac{\pi^2}{6}$$ This is inline math. $e^{i\pi} + 1 = 0$.

item.title: torrent
item.description: torrential downpour, strong gales unabated for days and days cool respite from the scorching heat a harbinger of climate change

item.title: About me
item.description: Hi, I am Pranshu! I am currently a PhD student in Theoretical Computer Science at TIFR, Mumbai. Previously, I did my undergraduate studies in Maths at IISc, Bangalore. My research interests include Automata Theory, Logic, Discrete Maths, and Algorithms. I create photopoetry, create puzzles, draw comics, develop apps and games, and write stories.

item.title: Contact Me
